colorhex 0.1.4
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get popular colour

Source: R/color.R
get_popular_colors.Rd

www.color-hex.com has a list of colours that have been liked by the most users. This function will retrieve all of these.

get_popular_colors()

Value

character vector of hex colours

Examples

if(curl::has_internet()){
get_popular_colors()
}
#>   #ff80ed   #065535   #000000   #133337   #ffc0cb   #ffffff   #ffe4e1   #008080 
#> "#ff80ed" "#065535" "#000000" "#133337" "#ffc0cb" "#ffffff" "#ffe4e1" "#008080"
